title: Spacious Family Home with Elegant Charm in Swidnica's Historic Center
description: Step into a beautiful, generously sized six-bedroom house nestled in Swidnica’s charming Historic Center. This inviting family residence offers three modern bathrooms and sun-filled living spaces, featuring stunning panoramic windows that bring nature closer to you. Create special memories in the open-plan kitchen and dining area, or unwind in the spacious residents’ lounge designed for relaxation and gatherings. A dedicated reception desk and 24/7 security ensure both comfort and peace of mind for your family.
neighborhood_description: Living in the Historic Center puts the city’s vibrant cultural scene right at your doorstep, complemented by quiet surroundings perfect for families and expats. Enjoy leisurely walks along the nearby waterfront, and discover local artisan cafes, history, and arts within a vibrant district proud of its unique heritage. Both public transport and highway access make commuting effortless while letting you revel in community life.
lifestyle_benefits: Enjoy ample space for family or guests
Seamless access to local cultural and waterfront attractions
Safe, secure environment with modern reception and monitoring
Green landscaped setting for both recreation and privay
Effortless commute via public transit or highway
target_buyer: Ideal for expatriate families or professionals seeking a friendly, culturally vibrant community with abundant space, security, and nearby amenities.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity in central Swidnica, this family home offers exceptional value with generous living space and premium amenities, perfect for growing families who want luxury, culture, and peace-of-mind security all-in-one.
